overview: John Eastman has over 15 years of experience in software architecture and design. As CTO, John is responsible for the overall solution architecture and integration points as well as providing insight on all aspects of technology-driven market changes. He possesses a broad range of engineering and software development experience in the areas of distributed object systems, massively-scalable architectures, relational databases and data security. Prior to Mezeo, John was Chief Architect focused on storage and distributed file systems for Houston-based Simdesk Technologies, a pioneer in online and mobile Software as a Service (SaaS) solutions. Previous to that he served as Solutions Architect for Wellspring Solutions, focused on their successful Distributed Object Server for real-time controls monitoring. John also brings previous executive experience as Co-founder and Principal of Radix Technologies, LLC, helping the company in the development of a 3-D visualization and simulation product portfolio. John holds a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science from Centre College.
